name: Metal Muscle Mage
description:
A “band” of adventures approaches a lonely mountain

Legends tell of a musician of such rippling greatness that they need only 10 seconds to prepare the next face melting solo

Some legends are true…

=== How To Play ===

  • Press arrow keys to complete combos for each character
  • Press TAB to cycle through characters
  • Raise a shield of the matching element to the boss' attack to protect yourself from his face melting keytar solos

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51
